snippet: The brusque Chuck Hagel was not known as a dealmaker in the Senate, whose confirmation he needs to become defense secretary.
abstract: Chuck Hagel will find himself with few close allies in the Senate when the Armed Services Committee takes up his nomination to be secretary of defense; 42 senators never served with him, and the rest include powerful Republicans who clashed with him over the American invasion of Iraq.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and JEFF ZELENY

lead_paragraph: The brusque Chuck Hagel was not known as a dealmaker in the Senate, whose confirmation he needs to become defense secretary.

headline.seo: Hagel’s Senate Confirmation Will Be Short on Old Allies
headline.main: Hagel’s Confirmation Proceedings Will Be Short on Old Senate Allies
headline.print_headline: Hagel’s Confirmation Proceedings Will Be Short on Old Senate Allies

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
